Items.Title: Oversight - TLC's Response to COVID-19 and Driver Assistance Programs.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - TLC's Response to COVID-19 and Driver Assistance Programs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing for-hire vehicles with an initial thirty day inspection grace period
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing for-hire vehicles with an initial thirty day inspection grace period.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation making it a felony to assault a driver licensed by the Taxi and Limousine Commission.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Making it a felony to assault a driver licensed by the Taxi and Limousine Commission.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to suspending monetary liability for parking violations issued to essential workers
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Suspending monetary liability for parking violations issued to essential workers.
